    • Method Detail

      • createWiki

        public WikiV2 createWiki​(java.lang.String branchName,
                         WikiType type,
                         java.lang.String wikiName,
                         java.lang.String projectId,
                         java.lang.String repositoryId,
                         java.lang.String mappedPath)
                  throws ConnectionException,
                         AzDException
        Creates the wiki resource.
        Specified by:
        createWiki in interface WikiDetails
        Parameters:
        branchName - Branch name of the repository from which you need to create Wiki. Not required for ProjectWiki type.
        type - Type of the wiki. WikiType
        wikiName - Wiki name.
        projectId - ID of the project in which the wiki is to be created.
        repositoryId - ID of the git repository that backs up the wiki. Not required for ProjectWiki type.
        mappedPath - Folder path inside repository which is shown as Wiki. Not required for ProjectWiki type.
        Returns:
        WikiV2 WikiV2
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - A connection object should be created with Azure DevOps organization name, personal access token and project. This validates the connection object and throws exception if it is not provided.
        AzDException - Default Api Exception handler.

      • deleteWiki

        public WikiV2 deleteWiki​(java.lang.String wikiIdentifier)
                  throws ConnectionException,
                         AzDException
        Deletes the wiki corresponding to the wiki ID or wiki name provided.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        WikiV2 WikiV2
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - A connection object should be created with Azure DevOps organization name, personal access token and project. This validates the connection object and throws exception if it is not provided.
        AzDException - Default Api Exception handler.
